name: Suicideville
description:
This is a casual game about Suicideville - where cats are always on the roofs
You play as a little girl who loves anime and believe in shiny future of Suicideville where every cat would be happy !

Show them how strong you believe in it!

- Collect letters to make beautiful words
- Save as much lives as you can
- Make Suicideville great again!
- Unlock new locations in town , skins and girls

use A D to move and Left mouse button to catch letters
